thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Balwin Properties Sees FY HEPS To Be 101.00 - 108.00 Cents Per Share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Balwin Properties Sees FY HEPS To Be 101.00 - 108.00 Cents Per Share
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Balwin Properties Ltd:
* ‍TOTAL OF ABOUT 2 080 APARTMENTS ARE EXPECTED TO BE HANDED OVER FOR 2018 FINANCIAL YEAR COMPARED TO 2 711 YEAR AGO
* SEES FY ‍HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE TO BE 28.15% - 23.18% LOWER TO RANGE 101.00C - 108.00C SHARE​
* ‍AVERAGE SELLING PRICES OF APARTMENTS OVER FY HAVE NOT INCREASED COMPARED TO PREVIOUS YEAR​
* DELAYS IN OBTAINING TOWN PLANNING AND LOCAL AUTHORITY APPROVALS HAD IMPACT ON DEVELOPMENT OF WHISKEN, BLYDE, BALLITO HILLS, JADE, GREEN PARK ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
